data.text: JUST RELEASED: #WEO January Update: There are tentative signs of stabilization, but global growth remains slow. New projections estimate growth at 2.9% in 2019, 3.3% in 2020 and 3.4% in 2021. What does it mean for the global economy? https://t.co/hXvIOVfqCo https://t.co/W8AFnt2GCC
